rooms.title: Zombie Prison
description: Destroy this Room:
Choose a dead Hero in an opponent's scorekeeping area. Send it back to the entrance of that player's dungeon.

rooms.title: Jackpot Stash
description: You may destroy this Room to double the treasure value of your dungeon's Rooms until end of turn.

rooms.title: Golem Factory
description: Once per turn, if a Hero dies in this Room, draw a Room card.

rooms.title: Witch's Kitchen
description: Once per turn, you may discard a Monster Room card to draw a Spell card.

rooms.title: Specter's Sanctum
description: When you build this Room, choose an opponent. That opponent discards a random Spell card.

rooms.title: Dark Altar
description: You may destroy this Room to choose one card from the discard pile and put it into your hand.

rooms.title: Succubus Spa
description: Once per turn, if a Hero dies in this Room, choose an opponent. Take a random Room or Spell card from that opponent's hand.

rooms.title: Bottomless Pit
description: You may destroy this Room to kill a Hero in this Room.

rooms.title: Haunted Library
description: At the beginning of your turn, you may draw from the Spell deck instead of the Room deck.

rooms.title: Recycling Center
description: When another Room in your dungeon is destroyed, you may draw two Room cards.

rooms.title: Monstrous Monument
description: When you build this Room, choose one Monster Room from the discard pile and put it in your hand.

rooms.title: Dark Laboratory
description: When you build this Room, draw two Spell cards, then discard a Spell card.

rooms.title: Construction Zone
description: When you build this Room, you may immediately build an additional Room.

rooms.title: Dragon Hatchery
description: (This Room contains all four treasure types.)

rooms.title: The Crushinator
description: Once per turn, you may destroy another Room in your dungeon to give all your Rooms +2 until the end of turn.

rooms.title: Brainsucker Hive
description: Once per turn, if a Hero dies in this Room, you may draw a Spell card.

rooms.title: Dizzygas Hallway
description: If the Room to the right of this one is a Trap room, it has +2

rooms.title: Boulder Ramp
description: You may destroy another Room in your dungeon to deal 5 damage to one Hero in this Room. (You may activate this multiple times per turn.)

rooms.title: Centipede Tunnel
description: When you build this Room, you may swap the placement of two Rooms in any one dungeon.

rooms.title: Vampire Bordello
description: Once per turn, if a Hero dies in this Room, you may heal one Wound. Flip over one face-up Hero, adding its soul value to your total.

rooms.title: Mimic Vault
description: When you build this Room, choose one ordinary Hero in town and place it at the entrance to your dungeon.

rooms.title: Dracolich Lair
description: Once per turn, you may discard two Room cards to choose one Room card from the discard pile and put it into your hand.

rooms.title: Neanderthal Cave
description: You cannot build an Advanced Room on Neanderthal Cave.

rooms.title: Torture Chamber
description: You may destroy this Room to choose an opponent to discard a random Room card.

rooms.title: Monster's Ballroom
description: This Room's damage is equal to the number of Monster Rooms in your dungeon.

rooms.title: Open Grave
description: Once per turn, if a Hero dies in this Room, choose one Room card from the discard pile and put it into your hand.

rooms.title: Liger's Den
description: Once per turn when you play a Spell card, draw a Spell card.

rooms.title: Beast Menagerie
description: Once per turn when you build another Monster Room, draw a Room card.

rooms.title: All-Seeing Eye
description: Once per turn when an opponent plays a Spell card, you may discard a Spell card to cancel its effects.

rooms.title: Minotaur's Maze
description: The first time a Hero enters this Room, send it back to the previous Room.
